## headingSegmentXY variable

Computes direction angle (in radians) of line segment `a` -<!-- -->&gt; `b` in XY plane.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
headingSegmentXY: (a: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, b: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>) => number
```
